title: Rune scimitar

properties.value: The rune scimitar is a scimitar requiring level 40 Attack to wield. It can be created with 2 runite bars at level 90 Smithing, or dropped by various monsters such as Zamorak warriors or Fire giants.

Item ID1333

The rune scimitar is a scimitar requiring level 40 Attack to wield. It can be created with 2 runite bars at level 90 Smithing, or dropped by various monsters such as Zamorak warriors or Fire giants.

It is the second strongest scimitar available behind the Dragon scimitar, but the strongest scimitar in free-to-play. Furthermore, it is considered the strongest melee weapon in free-to-play because of its high attack speed.

Ironmen may prefer to purchase a Rune sword from the Champions' Guild (requiring 32 Quest points) for their main weapon. Members-only alternatives to the rune scimitar include the rapier (after Cabin Fever), brine sabre, and ancient staff (after Desert Treasure).

Players can attach a Guthix, Saradomin or Zamorak ornament kit, obtained from beginner Treasure Trails, to create a Guthix, Saradomin and Zamorak rune scimitar, respectively. This only alters its appearance, and gives no stat enhancements, though the Saradomin and Zamorak variants will provide protection from the respective factions in the God Wars Dungeon. It can be dismantled at any time, returning the scimitar and ornament kit.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
26 January –
27 June 2005

The item's examine was changed from "A vicious curved sword." to "A vicious, curved sword."

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • The rune scimitar matches the Adamant 2h sword's strength bonus, and is much faster, whilst having a marginally higher slash bonus.

It can be created with 2 [[runite bar]]s at level 90 [[Smithing]], or dropped by various monsters such as [[Zamorak warrior]]s or [[Fire giant]]s. It is the second strongest scimitar available behind the [[Dragon scimitar]], but the strongest scimitar in [[free-to-play]]. Furthermore, it is considered the strongest [[melee weapon]] in free-to-play because of its high attack speed. [[Ironmen]] may prefer to purchase a [[Rune sword]] from the [[Champions' Guild]] (requiring 32 [[Quest points]]) for their main weapon. [[Members]]-only alternatives to the rune scimitar include the [[rapier]] (after [[Cabin Fever]]), [[brine sabre]], and [[ancient staff]] (after [[Desert Treasure]]). Players can attach a [[Rune scimitar ornament kit (guthix)|Guthix]], [[Rune scimitar ornament kit (saradomin)|Saradomin]] or [[Rune scimitar ornament kit (zamorak)|Zamorak ornament kit]], obtained from [[Clue scroll (beginner)|beginner]] [[Treasure Trails]], to create a [[rune scimitar (guthix)|Guthix]], [[Rune scimitar (saradomin)|Saradomin]] and [[Rune scimitar (zamorak)|Zamorak rune scimitar]], respectively. This only alters its appearance, and gives no stat enhancements, though the Saradomin and Zamorak variants will provide protection from the respective factions in the [[God Wars Dungeon]].
